Class PersonDAO

java.lang.Object
com.library.library_management.data.dao.PersonDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
DAO<Person>
@Repository public class PersonDAO extends Object implements DAO<Person>
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Person entities in the database.

This class provides an implementation of the DAO interface, enabling CRUD operations on Person entities. It also includes additional methods for querying specific Person records by properties, such as email.

The class relies on JPA's EntityManager for interacting with the persistence context and is annotated with Repository to indicate its role in the database layer. Write operations are transactional, ensuring consistency and data integrity.

  • Method Details

    • insert

      public void insert(Person person)
      Inserts a new Person entity into the database.

      The provided Person instance is persisted into the database as a new record. This method is executed within a transactional context.

      Specified by:
      insert in interface DAO<Person>
      Parameters:
      person - the Person entity to be inserted

    • delete

      public void delete(int id)
      Deletes a Person entity from the database by its ID.

      If no Person entity exists with the specified ID, no action is performed. This operation is transactional.

      Specified by:
      delete in interface DAO<Person>
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the Person entity to be deleted

    • update

      public void update(Person person)
      Updates an existing Person entity in the database.

      This method updates the database record corresponding to the provided in-memory Person entity. It operates within a transactional context to ensure atomicity.

      Specified by:
      update in interface DAO<Person>
      Parameters:
      person - the Person entity with updated values

    • getById

      public Person getById(int id)
      Retrieves a Person entity by its ID.

      The method searches the database for a Person entity with the specified ID.

      Specified by:
      getById in interface DAO<Person>
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the Person entity to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Person entity if found, or null if no entity exists with the given ID

    • getAll

      public List<Person> getAll()
      Retrieves all Person entities stored in the database.

      The method executes a JPQL query to retrieve all records of Person entities.

      Specified by:
      getAll in interface DAO<Person>
      Returns:
      a List of all Person entities

    • getCount

      public long getCount()
      Counts the total number of Person entities in the database.

      This method executes a JPQL query to calculate the total record count of Person entities.

      Specified by:
      getCount in interface DAO<Person>
      Returns:
      the total number of Person entities as a long value

    • getByEmail

      public Person getByEmail(String email)
      Finds a Person entity by its email address.

      This method executes a JPQL query to search for a Person entity where the email matches the provided string.

      Parameters:
      email - the email address of the Person entity to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Person entity with the specified email, or null if no such entity exists
